Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Antineoplastic Agent/Angiogenesis Inhibitor/Miscellaneous Angiogenesis Inhibitor/YM598
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: An orally active synthetic substituted phenylethenesulfonamide. As a selective endothelin A receptor antagonist, YM598 inhibits endothelin-mediated mechanisms involved in tumor cell growth and progression, angiogenesis, and metastasis. (NCI04)
